_sText:
So the other night i didn't feel like working on any other maps and i had an idea for a new map it took me about 8 hours to complete v1 

i was just playing it with some bots and its pretty fun
I'm still finding things to add in v2

possible changes for vs include:
brighter lights 
some weather effects
more spawn points
possibly make it an escape map 

thats all i can think of for now 
so if you have any ideas/suggestions for upgrades
let me know 
have fun 

:)
